channel.title: How To on PR
channel.description: Recent content in How To on PR

item.title: Poor man's pdf diff tool
item.description: Recently a client shared updated requirement document, unfortunately the document was in PDF and I donâ€™t want to go through 60+ pages of document for changes.

item.title: How to open/view/share embedded documents in Microsoft Word for Mac (2011/2016)
item.description: You would be surprised to know that Microsoft doesn’t support a viable option to view embedded documents. Embedded PDF’s are the worst, even the .

item.title: Raspbian + XBMC + Airplay
item.description: TL;DR: Yes, you can. If you are only interested in the steps skip to the relevant section. I own a Raspberry Pi for closer to a year now.

item.title: Grep - Swiss army knife
item.description: I have used this command sparingly in the past and I recently learnt more options by solving couple of my problems.

item.title: Disable networking/internet from command line on a Mac
item.description: If you want to quickly disable internet/networking to test offline features. Doing it frequently with System preferences GUI is quite a slow workflow.

item.title: Expired distribution provisioning and Yak shaving
item.description: Last Thursday one of my iPad app’s provisioning file has expired. Client brought it to us at the very late moment, the iPad app was distributed internally as an enterprise app.

item.title: iForce - Sublime text plugin for salesforce development.
item.description: I wrote a small plugin for sublime text to develop salesforce. I’m glad to share one of my idea to project execution.

item.title: Developing iOS application for salesforce [How to]
item.description: Here are the collection of snippets to do CRUD operation with ZKSforce (Force.com toolkit for iOS). Remember this is a SOAP based API, there is a new alternative library available from salesforce called MobileSDK for iOS.

item.title: Google Chrome : The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000005)
